name: Frontier Quest [Beta Demo]
description:
This game is an in-development build. We are currently looking for feedback so we'd appreciate if you could complete the survery linked in the game after you finish playing!

Rebuild a frontier town and grow its community as you follow a young adventurer’s journey to find a legendary artifact! 

Explore the frontier, fight monsters in turn-based combat and collect materials in order to restore the town and uncover the mystery of the artifacts. As you complete quests and get to know the townsfolk, you can learn how you can help them and grow the tiny village into a prosperous town. And perhaps they may even be willing to help you in return!

*This build contains the first 4 quests in the game.
**This build has no audio

Links

If you'd like to stay up-to-date with development or get in touch with us, join our discord server or follow us on social media below! You can also wishlist the game on steam!

Discord

Twitter
Instagram
Website

Controls Move - W/D or Left/Right
Interact - Spacebar
Navigate menus - Left Mouse Map

Move camera on Map - WASD/Arrow Keys
Recenter camera - Spacebar
Select Destination - Left Mouse
*Campsite Destinations (orange) can be quick-traveled to!

*Press Space or Left Mouse to speed up combat
